rules_text:
[i]Afflictions Cost[/i] – Whenever a player draws a card, Grima, Expirer deals 1 damage to target opponent .
[i]Spiteful Mastermind[/i] – Whenever a player casts a noncreature spell, Grima deals 2 damage to each opponent.
[i]Renewed Loss[/i] – At the beginning of each end step, if an opponent lost 4 or more life this turn, you gain life equal to the greatest amount of life lost by one of your opponents this turn.
